title: Buying a champ
body: I have 4885 ip, and I'm trying to buy Cassiopeia but it says that I don't have enough RP/IP to buy her or any 4800 character. Why won't it let me?

replies.body:
This is a fairly annoying bug that occasionally pops up with the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by launching into the *Legacy Client* to make the purchase. You can access the Legacy Client from the login screen at any time:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped!

Sorry i didnt reply sooner, but this helped a lot, thank you so much. I didnt even know you could launch legacy client lol. 
Thank you again
